comment: Great

title: Simple White Noise
comment: Simple.  No extra junk.
This app is fantastic, plus it uses math and is open source.

title: the real deal
comment: true generator, not looped samples. entire spectrum of color noise options. can change frequency on the fly, no need to pause. no permissions. best one available.
Great!

title: Love the EQ-able white noise! Helps me sleep
comment: I've been using white noise to sleep for years, but a common problem is, depending on the speaker, it often doesn't have enough low end or has too much highs and can actually be distracting or irritating to me. This app solves that problem forever and I really appreciate it! I would pay for this app.

title: Nope
comment: Not

title: It's very helpful
comment: If your ears make their own Symphony and it bothers you... If you hear the neighbors or people walking by your pad and it bothers you,  if you hear or feel frequencies that are sucking the life out of you and you're considering the foil hazmat suit... STOP.  You need this app.  It tunes up your brain. . And one can keep it playing even when in other apps, which I didn't think was a big deal until I tried it. 💚!!!   I am very eased by this app. Thank you. Please don't go away. ✌🙏😘

title: Great sleep app
comment: You can set this up to perform the way you want.  No cheesy chimes or fake jungle sounds.  Very comfortable listening

title: Great app for sleep and relaxation. Simple and fun to use.
comment: Great app allowing ultimate personalization of soolthing sounds

title: Awesome and simple
comment: No ads, no cheesy rainforest pan flutes, just a pure noise generator that lets you tailor your own way to block out the bullsh*t and personal demons so you can finally get some goddamn sleep around here. Use the color sliders to shape the noise from brown to pink to white and everywhere in between. Bravo!

title: Best of the lot!
comment: Thanks Paul for creating and updating. This app is a part of my day, and I am grateful.  Handy at the dentist office too.          :-  )

title: "Contains math" Lol
comment: Nifty app and handy for me. Thanks a bunch, man.

title: Great
comment: Works perfectly on moto g
The best noise app! Open source too!!!

title: Exactly what I needed
comment: Just pure white noise and nothing else! I customize it according to my needs. Good job, Chroma Doze!

title: Good fun
comment: Use the amplitude wave for 70s sci fi machinery noises

title: Exactly what I wanted!
comment: I was going to try to write this exact app, but found it when I was looking for audio API examples!
Excellent

title: Best App
comment: Very good app. Customizable to your choice.

title: Can't live without it
comment: Use this app every single day. Best white noise app I've found. Simple and highly configurable. Sincere thanks to the developer.

title: Excellent app for sleep
comment: More versatile and customizable than any  other apps for sleep

title: Wonderful!
comment: I can't sleep at night without a low, rumbling noise (pure red/brownish noise). It makes me think of space, which really calms me down. This is exactly the type of app I was looking for. This is the only white noise app anyone ever needs. Only thing is it would be nice if the developers added lower frequencies. I can get some nice low noises out of this, but I would love it if you added some even lower frequencies, preferably as low as the hearing threshold (think rocket launch sounds) and then, perfect!
Nifty

title: Awesome updates and it's free!
comment: I use this app to sleep every night. Great for blocking out traffic noise. The latest updates are great, especially the lock feature. No more accidentally changing your sound wave. Being able to save a few wave patterns would make it even better.

title: Used it for years.
comment: Puts me to sleep like a baby LOL. Great job.

title: Best white noise generator app ever
comment: Uses inverse fft to make the best white noise ever. Tune it to the frequencies you want/can actually hear. Plus no seams in the playback! Other apps that use pre generated noise have to loop a sounds file that can have pauses or pops when it repeats. Doesn't eat you battery either. Used my phone on a three day camping trip with the phone in airplane mode, and I still had 50 percent at the end of the trip. Get it. Period.

title: Simple. Functional. Effective.
comment: Works flawlessly and truly helps me sleep. Its most effective when paired up to real speakers with a sub woofer as the bottom third of the frequency range is crap on a phone speaker anyway. This app can drown out quite a bit!
Essential for white noise enthusiasts. There's more of us than you might think. Possibly.

title: Really great white noise!
comment: No bloat, no crashes, and the new auto-start feature makes it even easier to use!  I love that you can make custom sound profiles too.

title: Fantastic App
comment: Simple interface with lots of options.  No bugs. Works great.  Nexus 5 Lollipop.

title: Amazing app
comment: I've tried a bunch of apps for white noise and this one is the best. No long, no skipping.
I use this every night. It's perfect!

title: Awesome. I tried three other apps first and this one is the best by far. My fiance snores and I just got about five consecutive good nights of sleep.  Thank you for inventing the best thing since coffee.
comment: Love it

title: Custom white noise, works great, no ads
comment: Full featured in terms of multitasking and working with the screen off. Really appreciate the ability to select the frequencies that you want, giving you the ability to customize the perfect white noise for your needs. Only one permission, keeping the phone awake so that it can continue to play. How can I give this developer a donation? Great app. Really meets my needs. Keeping a newborn baby asleep.
Tunable white noise. Just right.

title: Outstanding app
comment: I love how the app allows me to actually customize the white noise waveform, and it saved me when I had to sleep three nights in a room with two snorers!

title: Nearly perfect
comment: A fade out timer would make it perfect.

title: Perfect.
comment: This is the most useful app in the store.

title: Works fine
comment: No extra suspicious permission needed. Lets you customize sound.  Some want a timer, but if you wake up 20-60 times a night like I do, you'd see why there isn't one.  Typically if you have a timer, the sound stopping suddenly will wake you up (if you are a light sleeper).

title: The only sleepy app that works for me!
comment: I've tried loads of apps to help me sleep. This one is the only successful one! I wish it had a timer though! I somehow feel sorry for my earphones slaving away all night while I sleep! I've sometimes had some issues with gaps in playback which is not relaxing but that is resolved by ending other programs first.

title: Big Fun
comment: Sound nerds rejoice!

title: Amazing
comment: Calibrate your own white noise! It's really fun to play with and figure out which sound I like.

title: Almost perfect.
comment: Very few things get me to sleep as quickly as this. Would be nice with a timer.

title: Why isn't there a timer?!?
comment: This app would be perfect if there was just a timer on it. It isn't that difficult, I don't want this crap playing all night long, just for 30 minutes.  If the creators had just added a timer this would be amazing, as it stands now this simply an incredibly annoying waste of my time.

title: Perfect
comment: Simple solution to blocking out noise.
Use this every night and can't live without it. Able to create the perfect "flavor" of white noise. Great!

title: Great app for sleeping!
comment: I use it for sound masking at work too!

title: Fantastic.
comment: Fully customizable sound.  No special rights needed. App developer is a Saint. Love it!
Does what it suposed to do

title: No permissions and customizable
comment: First if all, props to dev for making an app which does not require any special permissions.  Second of all, I love that this app allows omission of certain frequencies because pure white noise sounds really harsh.  We ran this app on a retired HTC Hero for about the first year of my child's life to help her sleep, and it worked wonders.

title: Easiest white noise gen
comment: Tested many white noise generators for my wife, who is used to sleeping with a fan, and found this to be the most versatile and effective utility. She absolutely loves it and the fact that we can adjust the noise type output is very useful. This is actual white noise not a loop of prerecorded static. Cannot recommend more!

title: Excellent!
comment: Free of nonsense!

title: Nice noise app
comment: Very nice noise app. You specify the amplitude of the components you want to hear. I love this for working. Rather sparse on features, but it gets the job done. I would love an option to automatically cycle through my presets with interpolation between presets to give smooth transitions.

title: Simple and beautiful
comment: Does its job - makes noise. Simple to use. Would donate money if offered to :).

title: Good app.
comment: Super app. Just wish I could figure out how to remove patterns from memory.....

title: Perfect
comment: Powerful interface,  excellent functionality. I love this app -- would absolutely pay for it. Paul, at least add a donate button!

title: Simple, works well, open source
comment: My three favorite things! No looping, true generated noise. Much more pleasant than recorded clips.

title: Great.
comment: By far the best noise generator available. One bug I've noticed on several devices however, is that after about 7 hours of playback the sound suddenly begins to shudder quite dramatically. For those of us who sleep with chromadoze that means we wake up after 7 hours.

Interesting.  Please post to this bug which device(s) you've seen this occur on:
https://code.google.com/p/chromadoze/issues/detail?id=9

title: Great
comment: Works as expected. 5 stars for no unnecessary permissions needed!

title: Perfect!!
comment: After a power outage shut my fan down and woke me from a dead sleep I had to find a small sized app (no wifi!!) to help drown the background noise. The sound from this can be fully customized to accommodate the white noise you prefer. Absolutely WONDERFUL app!!!
Best app for sleeping

title: Perfect
comment: Small simple app that allows you to fine tune the white noise to exactly block what ever sounds are keeping you awake.

title: Really good.
comment: Was surprised at how good this is, easy to use and no permissions, great app. Only thing id like added is a timer if possible. Otherwise perfect
It listens for media buttons and AudioFocus events, so it should be compatible with most sleep timer apps.  One that I tested is "robj.simple.sleeptimer".
Great fit when the kids stay up too late

title: Nice app
comment: Nice app

-Fully customizable. - no preset sounds on loop mode - no ads. Open source. No strange permissions required. - perfect for noise snobs  Create your own perfect noise !   Thank u Paul for such an efficient app !
Full of interesting features and no unnecessary permission requirements, actually none at all.
Cool noises. 5 stars for minimum permission.

This is the only app I've tried that can actually generate noise rather than looping some samples. I would like some presets to be included for common settings (white, pink, brown, etc.), and perhaps a way to enter numeric values for each band, but this is still an excellent app nonetheless.

title: Best noise generator there is.
comment: I've tried many and this one's the best!

title: Perfect
comment: Easy, functional, light, and free! What more could you need? Thank you, kind dev! B-)

title: not bad
comment: works, could use a timer function.

title: BEST white noise app! And it's CUSTOMIZABLE!
comment: Paul, please consider making this a paid app or at least adding a donate button. I'd certainly pay for it. This is the best free white noise app I've tried. I love how I can customize the frequency and create whatever sound I want. Please also consider adding an explanation of sound frequencies (definitions of white noise, pink noise brown noise, etc) as well as a numerical scale on the color graph. It would be neat to see what the sounds of each of the colors are when quantified with a number and a unit.

title: A Great White Noise Maker
comment: Unlike others, this app let's you customize & generate the type of white noise you want. I set mine with more bass & less shrill. Other apps offer just one type of white noise & are 20 mb.
Never worked.

title: Amazing!
comment: Thanks man this is really cool :) Edit: just one thing. I notice that it's popping/clicking a fair bit. Is there any way to amend this?
I've seen a few reports of that problem.  My best guess is that some phones have broken audio drivers, and there's nothing I can do about it.

title: Perfect
comment: Exactly what I was looking for. Thanks :)

title: Dig this!
comment: Simple, easy, low memory app for ambient ocean/wind sleep sound.

title: Just nice!
comment: Does what it says, and does it really well.

title: Best white noise app!
comment: This app has helped me fall asleep countless times! Most white noise apps are just an audio file playing on a loop. I always hear the point of repeat on those apps, and it wakes me up and effs with me. This app actually generates the sound, so no loop! Plus, the sound is HIGHLY customizable!
Would  be nice to have numerical representation of  bands and a little bit lower low range. Also - this is just a fantasy - would be awesome to be able to zoom into bands.

title: Fabulous
comment: Can not rate high enough,wish could rate higher.will be recommending to others.love it.thankyou.:)

title: Exellent app
comment: Simple to use , minimal. Best.

title: GREAT ADJUSTMENTS!!!
comment: Because you can CREATE just the sound that feels right just then, a very versatile. adaptable instrument!!!

title: Awesome!
comment: Bravo, a beautiful open-source program with no surprises! You, Sir, set an example for others to follow.

title: Amazing for tinnitus sufferer's.
comment: I have used this for months now and can't sleep without it. Being able tp tune into the frequency which is causing the tinnitus is simply spot on. Must  have for people with tinnitus. Thanks to the devs! 😎

title: Great Dev. Great app
comment: Worked perfectly on my s3 also on my S4 mini.

title: The best
comment: If you want noise for sleeping, this is the app to get. Change the noise so it's exactly what you want. It has a stop button in the status bar, it's free, and it has no ads. Only thing it's missing is a donate button!

title: Horrible
comment: The freak wouldnt let me install it get it fixed Asap

title: No permissions
comment: An app that just does what it says it will do.  No need for full Internet etc  Thanks

title: Great app, missing one thing
comment: I love the customizability of the sounds so you can get just the right one, get it to oscillate, etc but what it is really missing is a sleep timer. 3rd party app for closing music doesn't recognize this app and just silences the phone... No good when I am counting on my alarm to wake me.
Version 3.2 should now be compatible with most sleep timer apps.

title: Excellent app!
comment: Simple yet useful. Helps me cope with tinnitus and insomnia.

title: Awesome
comment: I wanted white noise, all night, no bells and whistles, no loop, no permissions, just pure sound control. Who knew trying to find something so simple could be so hard?    Thank you, thank you, thank you.

title: Needs Timer!
comment: Perfect!  Can make the exact  tone I need. Just need it to turn off after I fall asleep. Looking forward to an update for this hopefully. Would be willing to purchase if it had a timer.

title: Sensual
comment: Im using it on my note 4 and it is fabulous! Thank you so much!

title: Life saver
comment: Downloaded this app when our fan quit working in the middle of the night.  We're so accustomed to having the white noise in the background, that we couldn't fall back asleep.  2:45 a.m. I found this app, set it to a rhythm I liked and fell right of to sleep! This will be great for traveling too.
Excellent app

title: Perfect
comment: Finally found an all that lets me select the noise precisely.  Bode plots ftw.

title: Excellent
comment: Simply does what it says. Nothing less and nothing more.

title: Needs a sleep timer
comment: Pros: open source, no ads, no permissions (at all!)  Cons: no sleep timer, don't want to leave it on for the whole night. Also presets for colored noises would be useful.

title: Amazing! Using Gal note 3
comment: My search for the perfect white noise app is here! I love adjusting the right frequency and saving it for future use.  I hate high pitched noise and this app gives me the freedom to adjust what frequency I want and how much of it to come through.  Absolutely perfect!

title: Actually good
comment: Tried lots of other so called white noise apps. This one is the best. Lets you shape the sound, if you want. Generates a smooth sound. All others I could notice patterns, not this one.

title: Best Gen. App
comment: Just Awesome, Thank you for this amazing free app.

title: Outstanding!
comment: Really good, simple app for generating noise. Only thing I would wish for is some kind of random digital data noise injector into the sound then it would sound like SW radio.

title: Noise app I've been looking for!
comment: Wonderful app. Being able to create your own shape of noise is a wonderful feature. Pulling certain frequencies in and out is very fun as well.

title: Great for new parents!
comment: Helps to our child to calm and sleep, so this way helps us to make love. Unexpected GOOD.

title: Perfect
comment: Отличная программа, огромный респект от меня и моего мужа.;)

title: THE best! Simple Works Love It!
comment: THE best! Simple Works Love It! Get it.

title: Genius
comment: Simple perfect thank you

title: Presets and Timer
comment: Above features in title would give this app a 5 star.

title: Look no further!
comment: What an amazing app!, it worth each downloaded bit, my only complaint  is that the lack of timer is disturbing... Thanks a lot Paul for this masterpiece!

title: Decent
comment: I can hear when it loops, it pops a little. I'm using the HTC One.

title: Interesting
comment: Like manipulating white noise. Well done, dev. Good simple graphics.

title: Great.
comment: Best white noise app.

title: Useless
comment: Makes bumps every second which is totally against the point of white noise
My best guess is that some phones have bugs in the audio driver; if true, then there's not much I can do about it.

title: Awesome
comment: It's so cool. You can also create fast isochronic beats for learning or meditation. Would it be possible to somehow randomize the noise parameters so that the sound slightly changes over time?

title: Excellent app
comment: The best sounding white noise app out there.

title: No contest
comment: Using it for a while now and it's pretty much flawless. Unlike most noise apps, which rely on prerecorded samples, this is a short, simple, low power mathematical solution that makes the big 'noise app' developers look like script kiddies, who insist on using a hammer to screw in a light bulb. Sadly, those exact 'kiddies' are at the top of the market.

title: Brilliant
comment: Very modest permission requirements, libre software. Missing the ability to reset  the bands to defaults, I had to wipe data with Titanium Backup and kill & restart the app.

title: GREAT battery saver
comment: Customizable white noise, much easier on battery than competitors like "relax and sleep".  Free.  No ads. Open source, not many permissions.  Just added "memory to save previous sounds...PERFECT

title: Perfect
comment: Other noise generators want personal info - get real! This one does what I need in a small package with only perms to prevent phone sleep. This is how software should be done. My one request: an option to save sounds, for when we come up with really good ones.  Thanks for the update, the lock button is great! Tip for users: don't try to set each bar, just swipe a waveform.  EDIT: save sounds feature added! The only white noise app I need and definitely the best.

title: Great app!
comment: It could do with the ability to delete saved sounds.
Use the grip handles: up/down to reorder, and fling right to delete.

title: Excellent
comment: Does the job of suppressing office noise

title: Excellent!
comment: Stays running even though closing and using other apps just before going to sleep!

title: works great, no problems at all
comment: would be interesting to see filters for the sound.  ex: the noise becomes flowing water, wind, or something.  also saved settings that you can select and load.  that needs added, i would love that.

title: Great, but...
comment: Would it be possible to save configurations? For example, something that sounds like a spaceship and a waterfall.

title: Perfect
comment: Can't  improve on this. Get it and relax!

title: Saves me from going insane
comment: When my tinnitus flares up, this app is the only thing that keeps me from going completely nuts. Please never stop developing this app!
Brilliant

title: Best of its kind
comment: The best noise generation app on Android.  A feature suggestions: being able to save waves and having a few (removable) default presets would help tremendously both the experienced and new users.

title: A great app - at home and away
comment: Fills the air - or the headphones - with a perfect white noise.  Great for sleeping in a less than quiet hotel room,  dealing with noisy neighbors or in the office when you need a little "away time" from coworkers.  It's be a 5 star if you could save a profile while you experiment with others.

title: Perfect sound
comment: I've tried so many of these. Either the loops, or ear piercing treble has made them unusable. Finally, I can design the sound. I don't need water sound, or dishwashers, or crickets. They just sound fake. What I need is this tool to design what I need. Brilliant.

title: Best sleep app
comment: Get it

title: The best
comment: I can pick howvi want the noice. Play till you find the best choice

title: A great app.. Simple clean
comment: It thing is I don't know how to switch it off so I have to kill it

title: Wonderful app!
comment: This is by far the greatest white noise app I've found so far. All others have very obviously looped sounds. This app is made better by the simple controls and the changeable sound patterns.  Love it.

title: Surprisingly Very Cool
comment: Pro musician here. Rarely rate apps unless noteworthy good/bad. This one is definitely exceptional. As mentioned by other reviewers, needs a save function. Till then, 4 stars.   Oh, I find the gaudy sliders charming.  Bit tricky, but Retro.

title: Amazing!
comment: Please add a timer shut-off function and an option to save sounds!

title: Tired!
comment: 5 stars purely for the description while it installs! *contains maths* does it for me!

title: Really generates some quality noise!
comment: Simple and easy to use, helps drown out the noisy neighbors.

title: No-nonsense
comment: This app is perfect, it does what it promises very well and nothing more. Very Unix-y, if you ask me.

title: White noise generated, tiny app
comment: Great low-profile white noise generator. No loops! Would be 5 star, but I'd like some preset noise profiles because the interface is tricky to control.

title: No timer
comment: Works quite well... Would love an option to stop the sound after X minutes

title: I don't want to kill my neighbors anymore! Thanks
comment: This with my samsung headphones cuts out all the noise my neighbors love to make at six am in the morning. And I can set it up in the most soothing of sounds. The only thing that is missing is to be able to save set levels. If I forget that the app was the last  one I used and turn on my phone its too easy to loose my presets by touching the screen by mistake. There either should be a "lock" to guard against changes to the levels, or a way to save the levels as named presets. Rafael N.

title: Crashes Android 4.1.2
comment: Since upgrading to jelly bean 4.1.2 , chroma doze works for couple minutes  and then the sound stops. Using Samsung Galaxy S2. Loved app prior to upgrading. Please fix

title: Open Source Noise
comment: Never loops, and can make differing colors of noise. A+ in my book.

title: Perfect
comment: Simple and easy to use. Very effective!

title: Simple to use, minimal permissions.
comment: Draw a curve for easy configuring. Helps drown out ambient noise for baby and myself. With the right curve and amplitude, this app can mimic waves and rain.
Great

title: Intuitive and awesome
comment: Thanks

title: Great
comment: Small, simple and drowns out the tv. Love it!
Simply the best way to sleep! Constant noise i hook my music bullet in headphone jack amplifies the noise! No screwy ads, not a battery pig. Fantastic

title: The best white noise app
comment: Does everything I want. Clean and efficient design. Not a resource hog or battery drainer. No spamming ads. It's perfect.

title: Perfect
comment: Perfect as a random noise generator with user-chosen spectrum. Lack of timer capabilities and preset white/pink/user spectrums don't detract.
This app lets you create your own white noise! A simple perfect solution.

title: Zzzzzzzz
comment: Very good. Simple. Not cluttered with mindnumbing settings. Perfect.

title: Excellent
comment: No-nonsense. Small memory footprint, lower battery impact than decoding MP3s.  Lacks ability to save/restore presets, which is a pity. On the bright side it's FOSS, so if I was motivated enough I could add that feature myself.

title: Upvoted Because Math
comment: Also because the app works, is very customizable, is ad-free, and is only 43kb.

title: Ok, but REALLY  needs a timer
comment: Helped me get to sleep, but it also shut off my alarm.

title: Distracting
comment: It keeps popping. I am trying to use this to drown out distractions, not cause them.

title: Great
comment: Nice sounds

title: Awesome
comment: Works as intended and described and no stupid ads nor childish ui. Great work
Next update, save presets? Pleasssssssssssse :D

title: Great stuff
comment: Like it, thanks!

title: Brilliant
comment: Exactly what I needed. No frills, and it helps me study better than anything else. Thank you for writing this piece of software.

title: Exactly what I was looking for!
comment: Terrific app, appropriate permissions and a good interface.

title: Great sleep noise generator
comment: This makes wonderful waves of sound which help me sleep or concentrate. Try the options and get just the white noise you want. If this had a timer and a save function I would pay for it

title: Small simple and free
comment: This does just what I want, free software, tiny footprint.

title: Great app!
comment: Love it!  Would be nice if it had a timer and a user pre-set to save settings.

title: Overall it's nice
comment: A very good noise generator. It just should have an option to save presets and exporting sound files.

title: Perfect
comment: I have been looking for ages for something like this on iphone- just got a Samsung and found this: Perfect!

title: Almost great
comment: The only thing that stops this being great, is that the controls are too tiny for anyone with fingers bigger than a smurf's. You try to move one and end up moving 3 or 4! Can you add a scroll and make the blocks bigger or add a zoom function, please? And also add a user preset saver please : ) merci.

title: Am I getting trolled?
comment: No sound comes out... how the hell does this thing work!?!
Works great!

title: Does the job
comment: Very good white noise generation. No clicks or noticeable repeats in output. The only thing it lacks, in my opinion, is a timer to shut it down after X time. Other than that, pretty much perfect! No ads or dubious permissions is a definite plus, too.

title: Ok
comment: Ok, but needs option to reset to default settings (uninstall then reinstall works but is a PITA).

title: Amazingly Tiny App
comment: Perfect app. The only thing I wish this had was pre-set noises and a way to save and share or download presets from other users...

title: Just right with the right rights
comment: Simple, straightforward, easy to use, and better sounding than other white noise apps. And this version doesn't try to raid your phone for information. (please keep it with limited rights, the bare minimum to do the job)  I love that it is highly customizable to put out white noise.  Paul Marks, you should add some sort of link for a voluntary contribution to yourself via Paypal for this app.

title: Best of many I've tried
comment: I use this to help me sleep.   Every other app I've tried has a click when it loops which is very annoying.   This program has absolutely no click and I suspect there is no loop at all.   I love adjusting the pitch because I like a low pitched noise and other apps only have a high-pitched hiss which bothers me. I don't care at all about crickets, rain, waves etc so this one is best for me... and free!

title: Meh.
comment: The noise isn't constant. There is a short clicking noise at uneven intervals, sometimes more often than others. It really ruins the effect of the white noise. Otherwise, this would be the perfect white noise app for me.

title: So functional!
comment: Really works well! Cool concept!

title: Best white noise yet.
comment: This app is fantastic. I can shape how I want the noise to sound!  I have one pattern for studying and another for trying to sleep.

title: amazing!
comment: it is unexplicably good! better than the other white noise generators by miles, simple + effective. wish i good save some presets though...

title: Contains math
comment: I love the description for this. Does what it says haha.

title: Perfect
comment: Simple, get exactly white noise tone you want, easily. Also it's tiny and no ads. Too bad somebody ripped it off and added ads.

title: needs a timer
comment: I would give this 5 stars, but it would be so much more functional with a programmable sleep timer that slowly fades the noise out. Being able to save patterns too would be a plus, but the lack of timer feature leaves this app in the unused apps folder.

title: Excellent, simple white noise app
comment: - perfect for helping our new baby to sleep, especially wave function; low battery usage, tiny memory footprint too!
Great app. Not using it as "ear plugs" but for burning-in my new headphones. A pre-set for pink noise (+white, brown and so on) would be appreciated.

title: Back to sleep
comment: this totally worked in drowning out video game sounds from the next room! The sound was so not distracting that I was fast back to sleep.
Wonderful generator with varied output. Would pay to save profiles and allow morphing between pairs, or have presets. Latest update is superb.
Great light weight, and free white noise generator
The best noise. Not a looped track like most here. You can EQ to your taste. Great for studying and sleeping. Runs on the background. Luv it.
"Prevent phone from sleeping" permission is ironically funny. Great app, GPL FTW.
Great weapon for blocking inconsiderate neighbors! Thanks!!
App does not quit normally
Nice feature being able to customize your sound s, but too tinny, no matter what settings you choose.
Needs a shut-off timer and a way to save several different pre-sets. Otherwise, great app.
The does what it says and does it with a very fun UI. It won't reach its full potential until it has a way turning itself off.
Cool app, but there's no way to quit it and it takes over my volume buttons for media volume the whole time it's open. Needs a quit option.
Stupid!
Neat!
Nice app, simple n clean :-)
